title: Tiraz, 11th–12th century
medium:
Medium: linen, warp and weft, with silk for the tapestry weft. 
Technique: slit tapestry woven with plain weave
description: Silk polychome  horizontal bands on linen. The design is an inscription in Arabic which in translation is "Aid from God" , repeated.

tombstone.epitaph:
Tiraz, 11th–12th century.
11th–12th century. Medium: linen, warp and weft, with silk for the tapestry weft. 
Technique: slit tapestry woven with plain weave. Gift of John Pierpont Morgan. 1902-1-18.
